text: 11:10 Akar Mogomem 12:12; 13:8; 16:10Nguazimɨn gumazamiziba kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir kamning, aning mɨzazir bar kuram nguazimɨn gumazamizibagh anɨngi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me bar aningɨn ovevem gifuegham, egh bar ighiabar amu, damɨva, egh bizir aghuiba uan namakabar anɨngam.
